Bottelberghe Farms is a family farm, dedicated to raising the highest quality Miniature Zebu at reasonable prices. We, Josh and Jamie Bottelberghe, operate the farm with our two daughters. Each family member plays a key role in the day to day operations. We are located roughly 45 minutes west of Fort Worth in Patillo,Texas.

At Bottelberghe Farms we maintain 30 breeding cows and 2-3 herd sires. We average maintenance on a herd of 40-50 head annually. The initial implementation of our breeding program consisted of researching the highest quality of cattle throughout the country. We strive to consistently breed cattle with excellent confirmation and temperament. Majority of our calves enter the show ring under the great showmanship skills of our daughters.

Bottelberghe Farms maintains cattle for sale year round. By utilizing multiple herd sires we are able to offer unrelated packages to start or add to an existing herd. We would be glad to discuss our program or help answer any zebu questions. Please feel free to contact us at any time.
